alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 5:02AM PST until January 15 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Grand Coulee, Coulee Dam, Coulee City, Odessa, Quincy, Winchester, Mansfield, Ralston, Waterville, Electric City, Wilbur, La Crosse, Lamona, Ephrata, Ritzville, Harrington, Othello, Stratford, Palisades, Moses Lake, and Creston. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Conditions may change rapidly. Slick conditions are likely with below freezing temperatures.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse; Waterville Plateau
